resource_requirements.DATESTAMP: Optional, defaults to current date and time
resource_requirements.COCO2017PYT_DIR: Required, must be set to the directory containing the COCO2017 PYT dataset
resource_requirements.NVMLPERF_NSIGHT_LOCATION: Required if NVTX_FLAG is set to 1
resource_requirements.JET_DIR: Required if JET is set to 1
resource_requirements.DATADIR: Required, must be set to the directory containing the data
resource_requirements.PKLPATH: Required, must be set to the directory containing the PKL files
resource_requirements.JET_CREATE: Optional, used to create a Jet file
resource_requirements.JET_UPLOAD: Optional, used to upload a Jet file
